lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons. Glad you could join us for what is essentially the final and epilogue episode of our five-year campaign. We're excited you guys could come join us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not the final episode of the show!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We will return. We're looking probably at the start of the new year with a new campaign, new characters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we'll have one-shots and stuff in between.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we'll have fun stuff to break it up and give us some time to let off some steam in the meantime. But before we get into tonight's game, let's get through some quick announcements. First off, we wanted to give a shout out. If you guys haven't seen it yet, Shadow of War just came out, the sequel to Shadow of Mordor. A bunch of us have worked on it and if you haven't seen, we had the opportunity to do a cool thing with WB Games and the folks at Monolith. We did a Shadow of War one-shot that was uploaded as a two-parter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was so much fun!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were so cute, all of you. It was the cutest orc adventure that ever happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You watched it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both episodes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks bro!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a lot of fun. We had Sam, Laura, Travis, and the illustrious Darin De Paul as our four orcs and/or olog-hai, charging their way through Mordor in hopes of victory spoils and all that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what you're talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I recommend checking it out if you haven't yet. Merch update, Laura?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! Something I can say now. I didn't have the green light, but I am in that game. I had to fib and say that I wasn't in that game, but I'm in that game! I am back as Gollum! And I run around and I do this, and I do this, and I do this, and I do this. (Gollum voice) Tasty fish!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys haven't seen Liam's Gollum in the games, it's the most ridiculous--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also to point out, you did the full mo-cap for it. Not just the VO.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Broke my back, scuttled around like I was a young buck, which I'm not. It was great!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wish I still had the video of you that you sent me after you first started, yeah. When he first started playing Gollum, he sent me this video of him running around his living room, jumping up on his couch, then running over and jumping up your entertainment system or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I put my laptop on the coffee table, I hit click, and I started going--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was so amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I'm a nerd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Well, thank you for the follow-up on that, Liam. Laura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, technically, I have to shove this one to Liam and Taliesin, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we've been doing the thing for a while now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh, it's the new art book! Oh my god, it's gorgeous! I took it out of the Ark of the Covenant, and here it is!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I should qualify this, because it's not in the store yet, you guys, so don't go to the store and freak out. It just came into the office.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, this is just our viewing copy. There will be more details--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it say on the title there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It says The Chronicles of Exandria: The Tale of Vox Machina. One.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Volume One? Implying that there's going to be more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Implying that we'd like to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'd like there to be. And you guys can tune in next week to Talks Machina, where we will have more info, more details.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll say when they're going to go in the store.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you give a teaser flip of any pages?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have been told that I cannot give a teaser flip. But wait, guys. There's more! Taliesin, if you would?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we did two editions because we wanted to do something a little ridiculous. And so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this? A special edition?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a special edition. It's a little more fancy. It's got the ribbon and leather and gold foil. It's got an evil tome vibe, and it's got lots of little wonderful details.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have held that book and looked through it. I cried 97 times in one minute. It is so beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It really looks like crying for 60 seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're coming soon. They should be in the warehouse very soon, so that's happy for the holidays.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Joe Madureira art!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm excited!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there's lots to talk about in these books. I'm very excited!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And to cure any freakout, Ashley is going to join us. She's finishing up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing up shooting on Blindspot. So she'll pop in when she can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We keep trying to tell her that, don't we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait. There's one last thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two more editions of the art book!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got one last thing, for funsies. It's a really late birthday present. It's kind of for funsies, but Travis, I have something for you that I've been wanting to give you for a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that an experience?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I open it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck is this? (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it the Belt of Dwarvenkind?! (yelling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at how big the face is!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god! Hug me through my wife! That's so great! I can't get hit in the dick with this on! This is amazing! It really covers the whole kit and kaboodle!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And your beard will double in length the moment you put it on. I had to repay you for the raven mask you gave me, once upon a time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, our drunken ren fair purchases. I was like, "that's a cool mask! Where'd you get it?" And you said, "you got that for me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your husband just bought this for me! Thanks, Laura!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see. Other quick announcements. Wednesday Club, Taliesin, you have coming up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's October, so we're doing Halloween. We're doing Hellboy, which I don't really know much about. I couldn't think of anybody who knew a lot about Hellboy. Do you know a lot about Hellboy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know a

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to come on Wednesday Club?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, please! Oh! I bought a Hellboy comic

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Liam likes things that are big and black.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm glad your mind went there, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be Wednesday Club on Hellboy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you have something on Friday, as well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do! I've decided it would be really funny to be here really late three days in a row for the rest of my life, and so I'm-- I don't want to quite say "taking over." Is "taking over" the word?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking over Gather Your Party on Friday nights now, and we're giving it a bit of a revamp. It's going to be a bit of a different vibe. It's going to be a little shorter. It's going to be fun. Our very first episode is going to be called Gather Your Goth, and we're going to be giving some of our friends goth makeovers and having a goth dance contest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get made over? When are you doing it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tomorrow night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit, I'm not going to be here! Fuck, I really want to be made over!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well I'll tell you what. You let me know, and you can come over and have a goth makeover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next time you do it, you do whatever it's called, and then in parentheses Laura Your Goth, or Goth Your Laura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gather Your Laura. You would goth out very well. I think I would be excited by that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. To finish this up, let's see. I forgot to mention it last week, but those of you guys who have been playing the Telltale Batman game, the new Pact episode came out recently with Harley Quinn and Bane, and I play Mr. Freeze! It's been a lot of fun, and I've been continuously recording on it. Hope you guys enjoy more fun to come with that delightful character.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do have a cold heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true. Then you guys had a Sagas of Sundry announcement?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah! Sagas of Sundry announcement! Cast list went out! Who's in it? We are!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't see you there at all!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look again! Abigail Persimmon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The magic of the goth makeover strikes again! (cackles)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not coming tomorrow because I've already had mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I bought this shirt when we went shopping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right! You did! We went on a shopping trip, and we had so much fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was fucking wild.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone who hasn't seen any of the first season--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thanks for keeping tally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He picked his cup up without drinking it again! Picks it up. (thunk)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like an animatronic sailor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And since this is the final episode of the campaign, I wanted to give a shout out to all our fantastic crew. Wonderful people who have worked their ass off to stay here late every Thursday. We have Maxwell James, Dani Carr, Jason Corey, Ryan Green, Selina Ruth, Chris Wilmont, Zach Wilson, Sax Carr, Mark Donica, Anthony Videsco, Courtney Kraft, Ian Kagihara, Chris Lockey, Holly Pearson, Ryan Porter, Denise, J. Andrew Bernard, Ed Lopez, Rachel Romero, all of our fantastic mods who have done an incredible job maintaining the chaos that is Twitch, you guys are fantastic. We really appreciate all the hard work you guys put into it, and many, many more. The entire community, we can't even begin to express--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you say Fernando?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, I did. Wait, Fernando. Someone didn't put Fernando on the list!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And many more whose names were omitted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, thank you guys so much for all your hard work!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, let's come up with some more announcements so we never have to start.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Autoerotic a-pixie-ation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were real late on the draw, but this is the night to do it. I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right on time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's at that moment you hear this distant explosion. Glancing off the side of the platform you're on, you can still see, while the large titan, one of four arms raised, attempting to come and destroy all of you with one large blow, frozen in place, there still remains the dregs of Vecna's army down below throughout the city of Vasselheim, where battles are still raging in the streets. You can still see wyvern-riders and eagle-riders in the sky, though it appears that the gloomstalkers that once paraded across the skies over the city have been destroyed or scattered at the loss of the ascended god that summoned them. You also still are aware of the body of your sister, residing on the platforms below. It's at this point that you notice that the green tendrils of energy that hold the Tower of Entropis together begin to flicker and subside. The platforms that were slowly drifting, listing, suddenly begin to shift.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I take off on my broom, and I go down to try to get her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys dart over the side. What are the rest of you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had the immovable rod pulled out, and I click it where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You hold in place. You feel the platform give beneath you. Your toes are now dangling in the middle of the air as you watch the cracked-open right side of Entropis' peak begin to topple and fall beneath you. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still a planetar. Do you still have Bigby's Hand up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For maybe 30 seconds more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's the carpet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in my bag.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do a potato sack hold on Scanlan. Make sure he's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab him. Pike still has some time. She still has her wings.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can throw it to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be nice. Yes, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pull the carpet out of the bag of holding? Do you want to free fall and go after it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, the platform is now giving underneath you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you fly it over?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right? I'm still enlarged.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, can one of us fly over and get it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically, he was on the broom with me, so I could've dropped him off with one of you before I flew down to Velora.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're having this conversation about the carpet, you're dragged down over the side as the broom rockets off, Vex's mind currently focused more on other things. So the last thing you hear from Percival is, "Could you throw--" as he darts off to the side. The platform is beginning to give as the flickering green energy begins to fade. You guys both dart beneath where you can see upon the rubble, where the top staircase had broken apart from the original sundering of the top of the tower. There you see, still lying there, lifeless, the body of Velora. You rush in there just as the platform's collapsing. I need you both to make acrobatics checks on this to see how quickly you can maneuver in and out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, it's 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you cradling her, and at a moment's notice, deciding which one of you's going to take her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see it crumble, then break, and three separate pieces beginning to tumble. The tower then gives in from underneath and begins to collapse downward, almost like a controlled demolition. As it begins to fall and topple down below, you all gather your thoughts and consider other allies that were recently--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Falling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A short time ago, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zahra and Kash?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With Scanlan in hand, start diving down to go see if I can find them or have any sight of them at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the flying speed of your planetar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 150 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're watching the actual cracks as they emerge, as the energy's dissipating, beginning to subside, as your speed overtakes the rate in which it's collapsing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like Superman and Lois Lane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Ioun symbol on your forehead is flaring like a spotlight ahead of you. As you rocket down, you glance, you can see there across the rocks at the bottom, two wyverns that are scattered across the rubble, and you see, lying there, the bodies of Kashaw and Zahra.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up, Scanlan! Are they dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How high am I hanging off of this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A perception check? I am a million-- eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're high up there. That's a long way up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can use the carpet because Percy's on the broom with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're splatted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, they're not splatted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not you on the cliff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. They didn't goldfish it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But a good Revivify might help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just now approaching. As you get there, you can hear the rumbling of the tower getting louder. You've barely beaten it. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got to move them, right? Is that what you're saying? Scanlan? You're fine, right? Handle yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, she sets you on the ground as you look over and see the tower (crashing).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to hold onto my back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will climb on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I imagine Scanlan dropping that last potion as it's coming down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, if we thought we made it out of this--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 18. No, wait! Yeah, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. You manage to scoot by as one of the large chunks of the base falls over to one side, and as you dart out, wings before you, Scanlan clutched on your back, both their bodies beneath, you can feel the gust of wind from behind as the collapsing wall is pushing all the air in your direction. As you focus down, your wings out, you manage to careen underneath as the shadow that was beginning to fall over you pulls behind, and behind you hear the (boom), the dust pick up, and you guys all look down and watch as the tower finally falls to its final piece of rubble there on the ground. At which point you glance down, and you can see both of them, their eyes roll open, lolling in their face, both Zahra and Kashaw, seemingly conscious. If you guys want to step in? (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to immediately burn two of my healing touches, and you get 6d8 plus three hit points back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kashaw and Zahra, you've been lying there on the ground for a moment going, "Ow," and as your vision focuses, you watch as the tower begins to collapse downward in your direction. The shadow seems to close over you.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well, that's not good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 29 hit points to both of you immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with a flash, something white-feathered and blue shoots past you, grabs you, and you are thrust into the air, carried by the angelic form of Keyleth.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kiki? How are you, darling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you recognize me because of the antlers? That's why I keep them. They're very identifying.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I think I dreamed of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that was real and incredible, and you all showed up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did you come?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I had a vision.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's good to see you. Thank you for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had a vision?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I did. I had a vision of white wings, and blue--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I think we're all right.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Both of you?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Don't piss off a pregnant tiefling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah-- wait, what?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thank gods for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do it all the time!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I tried. Didn't work.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I wouldn't let him.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The tail held me in place.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You always said you liked that.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can you put us down somewhere, maybe?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That would be lovely, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop Kash, but very lightly set down Zahra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You tumble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Congratulations!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Did we win?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're healed up; you're fine. The Death Ward brought you guys to one hit point, and then she healed you before she dropped you, so you're fine.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, I deserved that. Thank you. So did we win? What happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're sitting on the titan now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're down in the street level of Thar Amphala.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But still on the Titan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still on the top of the Titan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he falling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pregnant?! What? I thought you were gay!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We've talked about this. It's all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take out the carpet and start making my enlarged form way down to them? By myself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Pike's with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Is she?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Pike's still with you up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's got wings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a strength of 19, and your enlarged size--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I dispel the enlarged?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense, at this size, that carpet cannot carry you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just hanging out. I grab the earring and I say: Will someone please do me a favor? Will you look for Arkhan's hand? Find me that hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it falling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was on one of the platforms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, you want to find his hand on the giant tower full of rubble?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Whose hand?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Arkhan's.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex or I can find it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you have both come down now to the base of the tower. At that speed, it took you a while to catch up to the rest of everybody else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look up and say: Grog, do you need a hand? Are you all right? Damn it, the pun wasn't intended, Scanlan! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I literally just said that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need assistance getting down from hanging from a bar? In the middle of the air, to be very literal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it would be nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fly up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your angelic wing maneuver.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can cast Fly on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, do that! Zahra has Fly, she can cast Fly on him!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast Fly on Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You'll have to get up a little closer to do it, because you're out of range.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I use my Cloak of the Bat to fly up and then cast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I fly up and I cast. Hello, darling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a second there, you glance down. Roll a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a gloomstalker coming right at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hold the sword out in front, you notice in a second, it's Zahra.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Not a gloomstalker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Together--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need some Visine bad.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Grog! Hello, darling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Zahra.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Did you ever use that moonhammer I gave you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the time. Covered in blood.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right. In the moonlight, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Need to get it cleaned.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Good. Well, I look forward to hearing your tales. Do you need some help, my darling?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do, unless you just want to hang out with me up here for a bit.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, I could. How is your arm? You know what, no, let's just do it. I cast Fly. Let go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He starts slowly--

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Don't leave the rod!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do I do this?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's all right. Just focus. Focus. You'll be fine, Grog. Just focus. Yes, think of yourself as a cow. As a flying cow. You remember?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Moo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grab the rod.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right. (click) Put it back in the bag of holding. This is great! Oh my god, I would do this every day.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, you could do it for at least an hour, so that's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I drunkenly fly down to everybody else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do, it's a slow spiral, and you begin to gimbal backward, and she has to right you a couple times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I fly right as I get closer, just for dramatic effect?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Focus on me. No squirrel. There's no squirrels. Focus your mind. No. It's all right, just come down. (singing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I come down!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, you could do that, too. Look out below!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three-point landing. Super hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Super hard.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Superhero landing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high voice) Not great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, not bad, yeah. Yeah. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Okay. You were rage-hanging? You take 24 points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Grog is dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And three-point landing. You watch as a crater is left beneath where his impact is. The smoke slowly subsides, and Grog's there, fist in the ground, Thor: Ragnarok style.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we're all on the ground now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are all now on the ground floor of Thar Amphala. As you glance around--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm flexing the wings out and around, and I'm making a feather bed with the ends of the wings on the ground and laying Velora down on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kash, tell me you have Revivify. Tell me you can bring her back.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I believe I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start combing her hair with my fingers, out of her eyes.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let me check. I do. Who am I casting it on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our sister.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let's see what we can do. I'm sorry, I'm still a little sore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. It's terrible. Please help her.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It was a terrible fall. Give me one second.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh. Her? This one? Yeah, all right. Let's do that. I'm going to cast Revivify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know how long it's been, or if perhaps your final moments of fucking with her was just enough to push it over the edge-- (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It keeps happening! Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 61 seconds.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can speak to dead, if you'd like to talk with her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I don't want to fucking talk to her, I want to have her back! (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's time for one message. Does she owe you money? I can have her find out where it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have anything a little more potent right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can raise dead.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well, there we go. See?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she going to come back as a zombie?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She'll be a normal--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just raised.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might need some help. Where's Pike?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can raise the dead, too, if you need help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike has been slowly flying down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She doesn't come back as a zombie, right? It's raising dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it the actual Raise Dead spell?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Mine is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It says three times a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raise Dead. You can bring someone back to life, yeah. It takes an hour to cast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they murder someone when you do that, like a horror movie?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I did it with Kash, would that--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm with Zahra now, so let's try to keep that in mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, two for two tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know how to respond to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your sense of humor is your best quality.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Isn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Best.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We'll get her. She'll be fine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys take a moment and realize the time, the involvement that would be here to do the spell, you glance about in the streets of Thar Amphala, and what straggling undead and/or cultists seem to have been either trying to scramble back up to the city or hadn't made their way down through or were here as sentinels are frantically trying to escape and being cut down and grabbed by the various eagle riders and the rest of the army that's currently now beginning to swarm in, thanks to the complete falling of the barrier with the sealing of Vecna. You do feel at this moment that you do have some time in Thar Amphala without any immediate danger.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: But if it gets to that, I can stay and raise her, and you guys can go and take care of the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't even know if I have a full hour left on my form. That's the only problem. That's why I would need help, but--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: She needs to rest, anyway.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can stay. I'll stay with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We'll focus on her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll all stay, until we don't have to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I help Kash as much as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit down and hold her hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Start cleaning her cheeks as well as we can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I don't take my eyes off of Vax the whole time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Shit.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm holding my medal. Starting the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys form a perimeter here at the base of Entropis, the sky now open, the clouds dispelled and scattered, and probably for the first time in weeks, especially from your guys' perspective, Vasselheim sees a sky of blue. The sunlight rains down from above, and the warmth that comes through is very comforting as you begin to clear the space and scrawl out the sigils and glyphs necessary for this Raise Dead ritual. As you're going through the process and you quietly begin to focus, you can see some of the eagle riders and straggling wyvern riders take notice and begin to come close, and then stop and keep a distance, and recognizing the significance of this moment, respectfully stay away.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: As he's casting the glyphs, he goes over, he's about to write the last one, and he walks over to Vex, and he takes one tear, and he goes back over and uses it to do the last glyph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he draws the last glyph with the tear, that one seems to have an additional flair, a connection, a sparkle of bloodline connectivity between you and the deceased. As you complete the spell, I need you to go ahead and bring to this ritual what you'd like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus, really? Oh, god. I take one of my arrows that has the owlbear feather on it, and I put it down next to her because I know she loved owlbears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to have to take care of him now. His name is Simon. Most people don't think he's alive, but they're wrong. He's very much alive. Take care of him for me. I didn't get nearly enough time with you. I'm sorry. I love you very much. I kiss her on the forehead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll another d20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good. 18 is good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Give me this boon. Help me save this girl, for true friendship, which I never had until now. Help me save her. Help us all save her. And I place the moonstone down next to her head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll a d20 for me.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'll use Luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you complete the ritual, all the sigils in place lighting up, it's unique because you're used to the ritual completed by an acolyte of Sarenrae, in which everything has a glow of warmth to it. This ritual was completed by an acolyte of an entity named Vesh, and as each sigil flares, you watch as they darken into the deepest shadow. It's a yin-yang dichotomy as the spell begins to take effect, until eventually the whole circle becomes pitch black, like the deepest of lightless midnight. At that moment, you watch as Velora's form itself is also cast into shadow and disappears from view. And for a moment, you fear she is gone, before the shadow begins to peel away like a cocoon, and as it tears and rolls back, the subtle sound of sand shifting and paper crackling, you watch as her chest begins to move once more, breathing, her eyes still closed, but life breathes into her lungs once more. With a natural 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hug her. Oh, and I pop Trinket out of his necklace, and I cast Cure Wounds on him so he can lick her face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As Trinket comes out, Trinket is burned and battered, armor dinged up and screwed up, on his face it's askew to one side--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't sign up for this shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've still got a 3rd-level Cure Wounds on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast Beast Speak. You all right, Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't care." And Trinket comes forward to Velora and begins licking her face, and she who is breathing but unconscious, the eye begins to slowly open. "What?" And her eyes open up a little bit, and you can see her skin darkened from the blast and the rubble and the dust that's now begun to settle around the base of Entropis, and she looks up and first sees the lapping tongue of Trinket against her cheek, and giggles and pushes him away a little bit. Then she sees the feather and looks at it and now looks up to see the person that's holding her and looks and meets both of your gazes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi, little monkey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're an awfully long way from home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What happened?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You went on an adventure, that's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gets quiet for a second, trying to remember, trying to recall. "I'm very tired."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she curls up and pulls tighter around Vex's neck.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Kash steps in. You don't feel evil, do you? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls back and looks over at you. "Who's this human?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he saved your life just now, dear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a friend. Come here.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but seriously, could she be evil? Seriously.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, there's-- no. You feel okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She arranges the situation and looks back at you and goes, (giggles).

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: She's fine. I'd watch her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls back into you and whispers in your ear and says, "He's pretty stupid, isn't he?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She giggles and then sighs into you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Just rest. I'm going to sit her on top of Trinket so she can take a little nappy-nap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And she passes right out. She is spent. She is exhausted.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The city is still burning.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, it is. We have work to do.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We've got a lot of people down there we know.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know. The Slayer's Take is in desperate need. We should check on the sphinx.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The sphinx, right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't thank you enough. Again.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You guys always do throw the best parties, that's for sure.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so glad you're all right.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Take the moonstone. Keep it with you. If you need me-- well, I won't come, because I'll be away, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you'll be a little busy with the child and all.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: A little busy, yes. But come and visit if you get a chance. Who knows? Twins runs in my family, so you never know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes. Lillith told me. I need to see Lillith again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the joke's on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give her a big hug.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I love you, darling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you so much. Congratulations.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you, dearest. Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You little bastard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I plant a giant, fiery kiss on him, and my tail wraps around his head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I try to get away, but--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I told you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right! Kinky. Ooh! What? I mean, thank you?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I miss doing your hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I miss doing, well--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We'll see each other, again, I hope. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Use that moonhammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will-- I mean, again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At night. In the night.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Use it in the moon--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Under the moon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, obviously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's called a moonhammer. Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Use it in the moonlight. I think you'll be surprised.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the nude.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARY
lines.text: Without pants.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Yeah. Moon for moon, as above, so below--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that will unleash--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Take your pants off, here we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double damage on cows. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to fuck some cows up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah, you do.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's just the way it is, my friend. Been a pleasure.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Take care of our girl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll try.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Take care of her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My regards to your family.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you, love. We'll be in Whitestone again soon. I'll see you soon, dearest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't see us too soon. I mean, whenever you're near us, you both almost die. So maybe just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give it some time.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: But we--

lines.name: WILL, MARY
lines.text: Almost.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes. You saved our lives. We can never repay you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I believe you saved ours first by showing up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We saved each other. That's kind of what Vox Machina's all about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the second time around you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I love you, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love you, too, Mary.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, baby, don't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Distant, emanating throughout. As you glance over, you haven't heard these horns before. But they sound less like horns of warning and more like horns of victory. Glancing down in the streets, there are still flames and columns of smoke and you can still see scuffles beneath. The siege weaponry attacks against the titan have subsided and it has not moved at all. It is locked in place, a large statuesque-like mountain of an ancient entity now lording over the edge of the Braving Grounds, almost creeping upon the outskirts of the Quad Roads towards the center of the city, leaving a path of destruction in its wake. Most of the Braving Grounds is in tatters but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (chuckles)

lines.name: WILL, MARY
lines.text: We've got to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? No.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We have to leave.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: They need us back.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't be strangers, though.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We won't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, guys.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look in if you can.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We love you all so much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, as well.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So this is what it's like to have a family, huh?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can get used to that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds like you're going to have an actual family soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well I shit more than your kid will, but other than that, it's like this but with less shit.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Then we'll be happy.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Call us if you need us. Anytime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We'll be here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Luck in battle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bye loves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See you later, smart ass.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Bastard. Treat her well or I'm going to come back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you've got your hands full, all right?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's true, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you notice three battle-disheveled wyvern riders that were waiting at the side begin to approach. One of them you recognize as a captain signified by these ivory horns that curl out of the back of the helmet and grow longer than the regular wyvern riders' armor you've encountered. Having stepped off the armored drake that currently waits, shaking its head, large leathery wings dug into the nearby rubble, the warrior approaches, pulling the helmet off, revealing a tumble of braided amber hair with shaved sides and a rather stern-looking woman that you don't recognise. "Vox Machina! I am Captain "Obelin. I would ask, does this shift in tide signify anything? Does the lich still loom about?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He fucking dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does not. The battle is won.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's been sealed away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is done?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Fucking dead." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lady Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lady, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The gods grant their grace upon Vasselheim still. We thank you. Well, there's little time to "celebrate. There's still much to be done, but please bring this information to the Platinum "Sanctuary, to somewhere of significance in the city. This information needs to go out. this will "greatly bolster the ranks, morale of those--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Start spreading the word yourself. You can help us out, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, we shall." She looks over her shoulder at the other soldiers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got the last flare from Whitestone from all those years ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a purple flare too. We should all set them off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say: I think I still have a Skywrite.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I send up my purple flare, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot you have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What a callback.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been waiting for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please misfire. Please blow your hand off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do this. (yells) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll a d20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (machine gun noises)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Say hello to my even littler friend!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys send up your colored Whitestone crest flares into the sky, what do you Skywrite?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vecna defeated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot of writing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of words.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wisps of cloud begin to spell across--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: V def.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) I can write it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As it coasts across, you hear this loud echoing (gunshot) as the N in the middle of Vecna seems to dissipate with a little puff as a perfectly aimed bullet from one pistol that does not backfire, because that would have been fucking funny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all I wanted tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So good.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: And closes his eyes, waiting for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I love him so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into the necklace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And as Vax and Keyleth get situated on J'mon's back, I whisper in her ears: I was going to say eagle. Giant eagle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. That's good to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pick up Pike and put her on my shoulders. Get on the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Pike climbs up, now wingless. "Thank you." Grabs onto the belt you have across your chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So do you all climb up onto J'mon's back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both harried, but alive. As soon as you begin to approach, their conversation comes to a halt. As Allura turns and sees you all, her face brightens and she immediately rushes up, tossing any sort of formalities to the side, and runs up. Before she can give you a hug, she sees the child in your arms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm so glad."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, group hug!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls you in, and you all bundle into this big group hug, heaving breaths of relief cascade through your grouping. You hear the throat clear behind as Vord goes, (clears throat).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Decorum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's Kima?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She seems all right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any word from Gilmore in the last hour?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, why?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was in the tower. He was a decoy; we almost slayed him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He'd been taken.

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: He's all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know where he teleported off to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We sent him off with Cassandra.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Into the woods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Into the wood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, it's a big woods. It'll be okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This city still stands. You have carried out a miracle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've done nothing. Word seems to--" And at that point, she gets cut off by Highbearer Vord, who steps forward, his arms crossed. "Word seems to have spread, and I wish not to celebrate "prematurely. I have reports that you were there, that you did battle with this ancient beast. What "is your assurance? What is your confidence that this is indeed over, and we're not lulled into a "false sense of security?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're pretty sure he's alive and well. You know, he's a threat right now. (whispering) What, do we have proof?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, proof.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never known a true sense of security. I'm not entirely sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The proof is we're here and we're alive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that titan has stopped moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am the champion of the Raven Queen. And she has allowed me to track his every movement for a while now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I recall you mentioning that when we last met."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was a process. We had trammels.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You remembered the word.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still have the remains of the broken trammel or did it shatter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that shit shattered. It turned to dust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, glitter bomb. Oh, glitter-bomb Vecna! I like the idea that he got glitter-bombed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You see, as you guys are discussing, the Highbearer's eyes lock to Vax's, and you see softness return to his face. The tension, the unknowing, begins to subside with a smile, comes across his stilted, older elvish visage. "You all. There was a time I did not look past your "beginnings. I am ashamed at my misjudgment." He looks around as folks begin to gather. He acknowledges J'mon, who's approached. They've bowed, carefully. "Many heroes rose to challenge "this day. Many we've lost. And many others that remain to remember them. Let us vow to never "forget those who gave everything so that we could still stand here to remember. You, Vox Machina, "stand as that beacon of hope upon which we all we hold. You may not fully understand the scope of "what you have done but I assure you, we do. And we will. We humble of Vasselheim are eternally in "your debt. As is much of the ignorant world, perhaps. On behalf of Silver Talon's Reach, I "thank you for everything." The rest of the room who's begun to gather now, you see other soldiers that were waiting outside as you first approached have begun to filter in. And as you glance back towards the entry hallway of the Platinum Sanctuary, you see faces. People that greeted you in. People hearing these words resounding in silence, and they all begin to bow low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we say something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ask for money?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They haven't done our fees, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm supremely uncomfortable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are the leader of your people. Maybe you should say something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a leader!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! But I'm not a leader of these people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've been giving us really good inspirational speeches. Get up and say something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get up and say something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say something really awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just tell people it was brilliant and great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I step forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you stand here amongst this procession of warriors, people that now look up and don't see Keyleth the druid, they see the Voice of the Tempest. They see one of the as-to-probably-be-remembered saviors of the city and beyond. All eyes are on you as Highbearer Vord steps away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm still holding your hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We of Vox Machina are proud and honored to have fought by every single one of you, and we vow to continue to stand by your side through the rest of our days. Huzzah!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Huzzah! (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, can you hear me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a wave of cheers that roar from within these marbled halls that echo, boom and reverberate--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To 1,000 years of Vasselheim! Huzzah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cheers and cries and fists raise and Pike's cheering--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yay! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Velora pull away from Allura's arm, who's come by to help you carry her, and she: (weakly) "Yay." And Allura looks to you with an absolute look of respect and pride. Even the Highbearer seems to be taken by the words. Shit, everyone in the room gets temporary hit points, practically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! 20 hit points now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A second one. And your eyes shoot over across to the Raven's Crest, damaged but still standing. You turn around to look at the rest of your family and as you guys look at his face, in but a flash you can see this dark shape behind him. This looming black cloak, this lithe dress that cascades down into a bell and drags across the ground. And there you see the form of the Raven Queen, porcelain mask, long dark hair behind, as her hands slowly creep over the shoulders of Vax'ildan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk to step in between.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In between the two of them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While the lips do not move on this mask, the voice in your head says, "You've done well, but do "not approach. This is not for you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you recall what you told me once?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No response. Do you continue to walk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. No, that's-- actually, you know what? Hey, that's right. I'm going to Resolve that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Freddie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not about you. That's a 19, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does not do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it. I have a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have done well, my champion. The skein of "destiny has tugged in your wake, and even this victory culminates with the crossing of a few "fate-touched souls. By your hand, your bravery, your sacrifice, you ensure a future for all you "love and all who will come to love you and what you've done. You may never know the import of your "time here, but take solace in the knowledge that you will see the ripples of your actions carry "hope for generations to come. My Vax'ildan. It is time. Say your goodbyes, then come join my side." And the hands pull away. She stands there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now? We don't even get a night together or anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got an infinite time. What's a few more years?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He sacrificed himself in your name; you remain the only ascended. And yet he still loses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With power comes a price."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not ready.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're ready for your people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not without you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am so very proud of you, and so grateful for everything you gave to me. You are going to be a strong leader and a wise leader.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll find you. I promise. I'll see you again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll never be that far away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Forever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boys. My brothers... I love you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you want us to fight her, just say jenga, and we will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe from the other side. Someday, just for shits and giggles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I ask, are you afraid?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go visit my mother, and I'll see all of you again. Freddie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do not accept this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. But I charge you to take good care of my sister and love her. And your friend Keyleth, love her, as well. She will need it. She will need friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you for trying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wish I could have done more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did everything. Pickle? Pickle, you showed me the way. I know it doesn't look like that right now, but you absolutely did.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wish I could restore you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Purpose. And I know I will see you again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Isn't there--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She said is there something we can do? It's hard to hear her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the light in all our lives.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never had a greater friend than you. And we traveled a lot, I never had a greater friend than you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like she's taking part of me away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will bring it with me to remind me of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how to live.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will see you again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will see you again. And I will tell your mother that you say hello.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you. I don't accept this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that it's hard. And I am sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to find you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take Keyleth's face in my hands and happily take one more kiss. I'm sorry it's so cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't care. I don't accept this. I love you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will never stop loving you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This isn't fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we have to say goodbye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For now. I love you, Keyleth of the Air Ashari.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love you, Vax'ildan. I'll see you again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How lucky, indeed. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Danoba will reach out to you and get your contact information and get your prize sent off to you, so well done. All right, so. Bringing us back in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something feels different about the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As the cold wind subsides and the feathers glide through the wind off the edge of the Silver Talon's Reach, pinnacle of Platinum Sanctuary, you gather your thoughts. Quiet creeps over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like I could have taken her if I had a gun. I'm just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, have we ever told you you're an asshole?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I use Manners on Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the save on that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. Where is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got to sort through all your coffee stains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These are my coffee stains.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's really irritable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus, you have so many things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I do. It's a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hug Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ranged attack roll with an attack bonus equal to my dex modifier plus my proficiency bonus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth sits next to Vex and lays her head on her shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Against AC?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Against you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. (laughs) I'm out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. That's a six, 12, 24, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay and what's the-- or it just hits and he has to make--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It just hits. You can make a strength check against 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To try and break out of it as an action, right? So as you finish your statement, Percival throws an orb at you and it expands, locks you up into this cage of metal bars and claws and chains, and you're locked in place, unable to move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feels right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that necessary?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll let him out when I'm feeling like it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Makes sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have the strength to argue with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled) It's okay. I'm okay in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I'll unlock it so he can say that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'll just be in here, crying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, please let him out, I can't take it right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I very quickly go through Scanlan's pockets to make sure there's nothing else that I need to take back from him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Manners.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That might be the last natural one of this campaign. You have to scream it from a mountaintop, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The golden snitch!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How could you do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Betrayal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A celestial hand reaches out of the clouds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, next campaign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One man's trash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know it was never made official, but I'm assuming you two would've spent your life together. As much of it as he had, anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He taught me how to love and I have a hard time with interpersonal relationships.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would've never known.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I would've held onto that one for as long as I could've. And I still will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I still count you as my sister.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I count you as mine. Going to have to look out for each other now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to quietly wander outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on the platform outside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to break off for a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, fuck that raven bitch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's terrible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know we have a temple to her in Whitestone. I mean, here's the thing though. I feel like I want to destroy it because I hate her so much, but at the same time, I feel like we should leave it because maybe we can talk to him through it. We'll try it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While we're here, I feel like if Bahamut is the natural enemy of Tiamat, I don't know if I want to be bound to this sword for much longer. I feel like my time of hunting Vecna is done. I feel like we have Arkhan's hand. Maybe if we handed it over to the Platinum-- these people?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then somebody else could take up that hunt, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If that's what you want, Grog. I don't think that's a bad idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Okay. I think I want to turn over this sword, but would you stay with me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Of course I will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's very persuasive. Actually, Scanlan, will you come with me also?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Can I make my way back towards somebody official-looking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be either Highbearer Vord or the one you met earlier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Highbearer Orb sounds good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step back into the Platinum Sanctuary, the voice creeps in your head. "I know "not what you're thinking, but know: together we are more powerful than anyone who's wielded me. We "could take him down. We could destroy it all. You cannot, you will not discard me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone ever? Stronger than anyone that's ever wielded you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyone who pursues his power."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's he saying?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're really strong together and unstoppable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel this (pulse) in your brain, there's a flash vision of the hand, once held in your grasp, swollen atop the actual body of Vecna in the battle. Your vision comes back and that urge in your belly creeps up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, hold on, Pike. Maybe we could do a lot of good. We could really rid the world of a lot of bad stuff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Listen, we did that before you knew this sword. We're all strong together. You were strong before it and you'll be strong after it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (exhales) Okay. (strained) Highbearer Orb, a moment, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you enter the chamber once more, the Highbearer turns around. "Yes, Grog Strongjaw, "what do you require?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to make a deposit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go on."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have on my person the Sword--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The words don't escape your mouth and you realize this was a bad idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs) I'm so sorry to waste your time. I wanted to thank you for hosting us. Bidet. And I start to turn and walk out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I grab him by the hand. So he can't go anywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you not doing this, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a bad idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We could do so much together. We can destroy anyone who's ever thought to pray to the now "Undying King sealed away. We could wipe his presence from this planet!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (strained) Together we could do so much, we could dry eraser-board the planet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whatever your wishes are, Grog. I'll go along with it. If you wish to keep the sword, that's fine with me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to keep it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scanlan, I don't think this is a good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Sell me on this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Look at him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's just flexing his face muscles.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's getting all weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (strained) I want to keep it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen him do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. He definitely does this when he needs to go poo. But this is so much worse!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it's been a hard day. I think we all need a really good bowel movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start walking out of the Sanctuary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, make a strength check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll and add your strength modifier, which I think is four.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got the gauntlets on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gauntlets bring it to 19, so it'll be a plus four, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, I think I had a plus one somewhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you get some boon or boost or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With a plus four, it's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Grog, roll a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll a one! Roll a one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Pike, your feet begin to scrape against the marble as Grog's form and strength, which is just a little bit more than you. He's a little more monster than your monster right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I swing my other hand up and try to pull more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow you one more strength check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really conflicted here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (strained) I want to help the planet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He seems totally normal to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, roll another strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still, your metal boots are scraping across the marble as you're pulling and trying to hold him back as he's walking out the room. The voice says, "Yes. Together, the two of us."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (strained) Just the two of us. We can make it if we try! Just the two of us, Kas and I.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Highbearer Vord says, "Is everything all right?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, do you want me to try to stop him? What's going on?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think this is not a good idea. Grog, this is something you wanted to do. You need to fight it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and fight it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already lost at the moment. So yeah, he's currently locked into that mindset.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, should I do something or no?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I think we could both do something, but I want Grog to fight this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And suggest that he think long and hard about maybe fighting back against this sword. One more time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then if it doesn't work, I have an idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So bringing up Suggestion here, make a wisdom saving throw, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. Okay. As the suggestion creeps through your mind, the familiar voice of Scanlan through your ears gives you just enough moment of pause to allow you an additional saving throw against the influence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe I'll take mine-- is it a wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god, we're saved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The suggestion does not seem to take hold and he's now dragged Pike almost back to the entryway of the Platinum Sanctuary and the Highbearer is still looking a bit confused.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's made his choice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! Grog. Stop just one moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I stop.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I look him in the eyes, I cast Greater Restoration. Still have another slot left, will that work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you to go ahead and make a wisdom check. This is contested against the wisdom of the sword.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm casting it at 7th-level because that's all I have left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, it's not going to have much of an effect on this really, unfortunately. But the spell's cast. So roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're smarter than a sword!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I get an advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no in the circumstance. Just roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier, which I believe is a five?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have. Yeah, it's five. So nine.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, (laughs).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not worth it. It's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax comes back and kills you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I rolled a seven and he has a wisdom modifier of plus one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, you did it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like I legitimately-- that's pretty stupid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you use my die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I did not use your die. I used my purple one. I'm saving yours for the next campaign. So as the strength of wills between the cleric and the sword begin to combat, the warmth of Pike's friendship and the force of Sarenrae's guidance washes through your body and the cold steel of the sword begins to warm to the touch. And for a brief minute, it gets so warm it's hot. It burns your fingertips and you instinctively throw the blade to the ground. It clatters and slides about 15 feet from you, spiralling and sparking across the marble floor. The Highbearer's foot catches it in place. He leans forward. "Now I'm certainly curious."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (deep breath) It is the Sword of Kas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the color begins to somewhat return to Grog's face, his eyes returning to their natural pigment. The sallow, sunken features of his body begin to fill out once more, the influence of the blade having left his psyche and physicality.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. You're back to light gray again. You look great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm feeling so achy. What happened? Whew!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You made a decision and I felt it was the right thing to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We kept the sword, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it's there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're holding it for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you can see two of the other Scalebearer guardians have flanked the sides of the Highbearer. As he removes his foot from the blade and steps back, they both carefully lift it with a gauntlet and present it before him and he glances down. "So you say this blade aided you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. That blade, careful with it, very powerful. He is bent on the destruction of one thing and one thing only. Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to know. We'll keep this within our vaults in case the day or time arises."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait! I have something else. Then I show the hand of Arkhan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?" It flops limply in your grasp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
