lines.text: Oh! The person that owned this hand-- okay, stay with me. Chopped this off and took Vecna's hand and stuck it on and then this got left over. So this is not his hand anymore and the one that he does have is Vecna's. So if you use your noodle, you can use this to trace him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are limitations to the use of such objects. It may be of some aid to us, but the "knowledge of this individual is far more important. However, we will accept this thing." And he ushers his hand forward and another servant comes forward and retrieves the hand from you and folds the fingers up and places it within a small pillow. Backs away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think that was a great idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right? It was pretty smart.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, it was very smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What was the name of this? This current wielder of the Hand of Vecna."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Arkin. Arkeen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Arkhan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Arkhan. Arkhan the Fool. The Cruel. The--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Misguided.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Arkhan the Misguided?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't underestimate him. He's really buff and devious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he's got another hand that he could chop off too. One in reserve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. So we'll begin to do research and seek out this Arkhan the Cruel?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. Yeah, he was pretty cool. He was pretty cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was fighting a god. I didn't really catch his name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well see, don't hurt him. He actually helped us defeat Vecna. He pulled a tricksy-doodle and took the hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would do whatever it takes to not trust individuals who would steal such an artifact with "their own means."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The will of Bahamut turned on him now, I doubt "he'll find a place to hide. Thank you very much."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Beep beep. All right, Pike, shall we away?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We shall away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, shall we away?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Away we shall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Away we-- oui oui?

lines.name: ASHLEY, SAM
lines.text: Oui oui!

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: Bidet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bidet." As you exit the Sanctuary, you meet up with the rest of your friends that are still taking their quiet moments of reflection on the exterior platform on the outside of the Sanctuary overlooking the eastern side of Vasselheim.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do you feel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel good. I feel like pursuing Vecna was something that we all did together and I feel like whatever we do now is new and I felt like I was going to have to do that on my own and I don't want to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, you wouldn't have to do anything on your own.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We're in this together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got a thing, actually, I've got to get to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I walk over to Percy? Are you still over by yourself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sitting in a corner and I'm staring into the reflection of my sword. And I'm gently tapping the contract in my pocket. And I'm going to say, Ipkesh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I'm going to sit down next to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're too late. You've been doing a thing. Could you bring him back? Would it, the thing that you gave me, bring him back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no answer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm. Nothing at all. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now I'm going to sit down next to you. How are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I was going to be a clockmaker once. I haven't thought about that. There was a moment. Do you remember when we met?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I, for a brief time, thought that I had died within that prison and I was having a fever dream from starvation and this was what that felt like, was my mind making stories of friends and adventures and these things I would never do because I was a coward and fool. I miss my family so much and I've done some terrible things. I gave Grog that sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It didn't feel real.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now it does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. This is new. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you going to do? Are you going to fight the Raven Queen for me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Many years ago, I went to make a deal with her and she told me that I was broken and that I had always been broken. Part of me was going to save your brother and really, I just wanted to prove it to her. I wanted to hurt her for hurting me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we're all broken, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so tired of hurting people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have to hurt anyone anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love you very much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This has been a terrible day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's horrible!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe I'll not apologize to Grog. That sounds like a really terrible idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a good person and you're not broken anymore. All right? We'll filling each other's gaps. We'll be the glue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And don't do anything crazy anymore. No deals with Raven Queens, all right? Let's not fight any more gods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say let's destroy the one in Whitestone. Maybe we could seal it up, leave it because you know, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see if I can talk to him through it. Is that stupid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm too tired to be angry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did a thing today. A pretty big thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been a long day. Yeah, we'll rejoin. Sorry about Manners. That was rude.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you apologizing for something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's stupid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I never said sorry for leaving!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but you're you. You don't have to apologize, we just assume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm sorry. Sorry I left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You handing out apologies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. Yes. Sorry about the skull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I'm pretty sure you just handed out an apology after you just said you weren't going to hand out an apology.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You people wouldn't understand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Percy is a walking contradiction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will consider accepting your apology if you tell me whatever happened to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Oh my god. I legitimately don't remember.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought-- wait, we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wherever it is, it's beyond our grasp now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you just sitcom mug? "Okay, Allura!" (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If we could've freeze-framed and rolled credits on that to end the campaign, I would have been happy. (laughs) Allura takes her hands back, then reaches over and musses up the side of Pike's hair. (sighs) "We've been through quite a bit together, haven't we?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lot of ups and downs."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were quite an inspiration, Allura. I hope you know. You inspired me quite a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm only doing what everybody else is doing in this world: make it up as you go along."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know a lot about that. Allura, is Vasselheim going to be looking for members to join the council?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vasselheim? What do you mean? Vasselheim is mostly a religious council, if you know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could put in a word, but I didn't consider this really your type of--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's asking for somebody else, I'm pretty sure she wasn't asking for her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I actually was, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. I can inquire."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was thinking Pike, but I don't know--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I do recall, you have a temple here. One that you pretty much built."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How is that temple right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a very good question. Pike? Would you like to go see your temple?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like to go see my temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." She waves her fingers a bit and casts Fly on all of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, on everybody?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On a high enough level, you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike! Go upside down! (wookiee growl)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the best wookiee noise you've ever made, babe!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a really good wookiee noise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (mediocre wookiee growl)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Retracted immediately. As she was here helping defend, she didn't waste her 8th-level slot, she is able to get you guys all flying for the moment and you all coast. As she finishes casting the spell, you could see some of the nearby wardens of the Platinum Sanctuary go, "Um--" "I know it's arcane, shut up. It's fine." You all take off the steps and begin to glide down over to the city, and there you can already see people are coming out of their homes. Exactly. So eventually, you find your way north to the Quadroads, towards the base of the Heaven Stair Mountain, where the temple resides. The temple looks like it's sustained a little bit of damage. It looks like a portion of the upper floor of the three-tier tower-- Colosseum-esque, but it does taper a bit towards the top. The top part has partially fallen in and it looks like it's seen wear and tear, but it doesn't look like it's been destroyed or anything. As you come up to the temple, you can already see there are refugees of homes that were destroyed from the incursion of the Braving Grounds that are being gathered in and the temple's filled with people. On the outside, you see Gesyra, the older woman who helped you found the temple and build it. As she approaches, she's now one of the Priests of Rebirth and has been working with you for some time and turns and sees your face. You can see her graying hair, which is bunned up very tightly in the back. She has her spectacles and she has the long robes of blue and gold. She sees you. "My "Pike!" She rushes up and gives you a hug. She's much bigger than you, being a human, but her posture puts her almost on your level. "I'm so glad you're safe."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so wonderful to see your face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've housed who we can. We're a bit at capacity at the moment."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well, it looks a bit better than I thought it would.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We did our best to defend. Is it done?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her eyes crack at that moment and tears begin to flow. She smiles. "I knew you could "do it."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, we all did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks around at the rest of you, pats you on the head for a minute and pulls away and goes, "You get to wear the greatest outfits, don't you?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (giggles)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, anything you need, food, we have room for a few more."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would suggest that we-- there's bars here, right? In Vasselheim? They drink, don't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah. There's bars here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe they do a dry city after a certain time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you kidding me? Religion and alcohol go together perfectly. That's a time-honored tradition!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we go find a tavern somewhere and let these people pick up the pieces, and give them their space?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need any type of water, or anything we can immediately assist you with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Clean water would be wonderful."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have somewhere to put it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just a moment!" And she goes inside for a moment and calls out, four of the other lower acolytes of Sarenrae's temple, and they all have various buckets and reservoirs--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I burn as many Create Water spells as it takes to fill them up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They bring you inside, where there's the large statue of Sarenrae, where you had your first vision that called you to come find her. And there is a fountain as part of that and a reservoir in the bottom that has currently been mostly emptied to facilitate everyone here who needed water or to clean wounds. You help fill that and you very, very quickly manage to get the temple back to an easily sustainable level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I hand Pike my contract.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) I take it. Percy, what is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This, I thought, was proof that I was in control of myself. But it's just a terrible thing waiting to happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley, I just texted you the contract.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. How do you have it on autosave?! Do you just have it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I somewhat know what it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it can be destroyed. But maybe it can be put far away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will keep this, at the very least, very far from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have every faith in you. Thank you. I think I'm done with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, I have a porno book that I really think I shouldn't have anymore. Can I give it to you to take it away--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take it away!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you'll take it? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to bid on it, as well. Yeah, I have some money still--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you text it to us actually?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could you text me the book?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a three jpeg, man. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys go off to find a tavern and drink together?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. We need to go have some toasts to Vax.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said Allura took Velora?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Well, at this point, she's probably still carrying her with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. I thought you said Allura took her away. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because Allura took her off of you-- You know what? No, she's probably being tended to at the Platinum Sanctuary at the moment, seeing to her wounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I just leave her? I feel weird just leaving her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She'll be fine. She'll be safe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's in some pretty solid hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll run back and talk to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you head back into the Sanctuary and retrieve her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to make sure her wounds were tended because she was pretty busted up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She was. Thankfully, there are a number of clerics and healers available that can take a moment away from the wounded of the battle to deal with a little girl. And when you come to her, she's still a bit battered and bruised. But she's all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anyone who can send me to Syngorn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why doesn't she stay with us for a while?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're asking this of anybody at the temple?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think we should--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can take a day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think maybe a little time spent in our company, as opposed to your father's company, would not be the worst idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe a message of Sending. Can anyone do that? Pike? Do you have the message of Sending?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To whom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To my father.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To let him know that his daughter is still alive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't have it with me, but I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Allura, you've done it before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you send something to my father?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could. I could also bring her there, if you'd like."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Velora, would you want to go home right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now she's holding onto your neck a bit. She looks at you. "I miss you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I miss you too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can I stay a bit longer?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so too. Allura, will you say that Velora is safe, and that I'll be paying a visit very soon to return her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I believe that," and for a moment she looks just beyond your eyes, squints, "he's aware."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So to drinks?"

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: To drinks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't really drink. But after a day like today, I think I need one."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Apple juice for you, little one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She giggles in your ear. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm bringing my sister to a bar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your nearly dead sister.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. She's going to have to be introduced at some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Allura takes a moment and squints her eyes for a second, apparently Sending another message, and then nodding. She leads you guys towards the Quadroads, and finds a pub called The Quarry's End. And it's not too far from Sarenrae's temple, which is why she chose it, and it looks to be like it was near a quarry that was built into the mountain that either dried up or was closed down for some reason, and then a tavern was opened instead as a means of still making money. It's super dive-y, it smells of stained wood and spilled wine. It's musty and perfect. And as you all come in, it's mostly empty, as people are still in the process of trying to figure things out. The few that are in there appear to be wounded soldiers that, as opposed to getting medical help, are in the process of drinking themselves into a numb state. But you find a table, you sit down, one of the barmaids comes up to you, goes: "Drinking away the fray, are you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put, like, 20 gold on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will take the cheapest, worst beer you have, and a round for everyone in the bar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course, sir! My pleasure!" Takes the coin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If everyone's all right with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, dear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I also start pulling out the remaining eight expensive-ass bottles of wine from the bag of holding?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hell yeah! Drunk as shit! Now's the time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within moments, your table is covered in terrible beer and really expensive wine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Expensive-ass!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what you wrote down, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Expensive-ass bottles of wine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull two tables together and you guys are in the process-- You're a fair bit into your cups, and then the somewhat ajar door on the exterior slams open as the light filters in from the outside, and there you see standing the general half-height of an armored halfling, partially bloodied, armor dented as shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Kima!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima, as she walks in, sauntering in, with her blade being sheathed in the back of her giant scabbard, her Holy Avenger. "Got your message, honey! Not going to pass up a drink after a "day like this!" (cracking) "Ow, ow, ow!" She comes and sits down next to Allura and puts her arm around her real fast. "This is new!" and points to the drink in front of Allura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a special occasion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're bad influences.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Desperate times and all that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. I guess that's why we're friends."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see you're working the late shift.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you know. When there's streets crawling with skeletons, I got to be there."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Been having a good time, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, it's been amazing! It's been terrible! Terrible. But amazing!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we frontloaded our hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we have another cup?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!" The barmaid comes by, gets another cup, and leaves you guys all to drink and swap stories.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That thing that I was bugging you about?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which one? You bug me about a lot of things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's fair. Now that I have a bit of alcohol in me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and you ask me after I have a bit of alcohol in me. And I scry on Cassandra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, he flipped a page. I hate that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your vision jumps once more to the exterior of the castle, jumps once more, and there you see, lying in bed, covers pulled up to her chest, with at least three different servants and one medical personnel there at her side, bag open, tending to her wounds. She's asleep, but she's breathing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks like she's been tended to like a proper de Rolo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see Kaylie and Gilmore?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I see Kaylie and Gilmore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in the room, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She made it back to Whitestone. One would assume that's how she got there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was not doing well. Gilmore was the most able-bodied. I'm assuming he got her there. I hope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure. I have faith.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll scry on the rest of them tomorrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm drunk. Don't get used to it.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Faithless until the end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Percy.

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: Thank you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You taught me just the right amount of how to be a shithead. Just enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should toast to Vax'ildan, our fallen member.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Kima goes, "Yeah, where is that asshole, anyway?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's really stealthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ain't that the truth. All right." She grabs her cup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Apple juice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's holding a cup.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you have, Ashley?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glasses raised, and at this point as the glasses are raised, you can hear whispers off to the side. You glance over, and you can see one of the nearby tables, which is filled with four Bastions who had been drinking to the battle and have now taken notice and seemingly recognized who's at the table across the way. They're all staring, and they all grab their glasses and raise them, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To Vax'ildan. He was the best of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The most selfless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The most frequently naked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The most frustrating.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The brightest and the darkest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. To Vax.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: To Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. What comes next?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does come next?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs) It's hard to think after a day that feels like a week, like today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Syngorn and Whitestone, I would assume.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Home for a bit, at least. And of course,

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got to get back to Zephrah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have to check on Greyskull Keep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In Emon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Someone should stay there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We left it as an outpost. I wouldn't mind going back to Whitestone for a bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also say, for those of you, especially. Grog, you have your freedoms, and if you wanted to become lord of Greystone and have a place of your own that you could invite us to, as opposed to wandering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Greyskull?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Greyskull.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (hesitant noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or you could just hang in Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll think about it. It seems like that has responsibilities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Grand Poobah has a lot of responsibilities, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. There is an updated tour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where Kaylie is, right? We assume.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think I can go back to Whitestone with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, why? You've got to go back to your people?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to go back to Zephrah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I think we're going to need help getting to Whitestone, and then I think it's going to take at least a day for you to regain the power to return to your people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bad influences, all of you. Assholes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not getting rid of you quite that easily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. One day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you can bear it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I want to not see your faces for a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, that makes sense. Pikey-poo, where are you going?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I'd like to come with you guys for a little bit because frankly, I don't really want to be alone for a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think any of us do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pull her into the biggest hug.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, P-- oh, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You almost called me your own name. It's okay. You'll be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was going to call you Poobah, but then I wanted to say your real name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've still got a little bit of juice left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got enough juice to get us to Whitestone right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do, believe it or fucking not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't. You gave us the option.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said believe it or fucking not. I call nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it was more of a rhetorical-- it's like a trick or treat-- why do we still try to explain things to him? I haven't learned.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because he's learning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima's clasping her cup and goes, "I can watch this all day."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He learns something new every day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did Whitestone look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's blurred at a distance. Aside from the specific target of your scrying, you don't get much of a vision, just an idea of the blurry exterior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we drunkenly walk to the tree?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we transporting tonight? Why don't we chill for a night?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you want to see your daughter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, of course, but I'm drunk and bloody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can drunkenly walk there and take our time and enjoy the stars and we can-- oh! Scanlan--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you have a drink?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What can we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can do little arcane cantrips when no one's looking and break the rules a little bit. Of Vasselheim. Just cantrips, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're such a rebel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I forgot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing. You're fine. Love you very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've lost the love of my life today. I'm allowed to be belligerent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we throwing caution to the wind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do have something that might up the party a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, what is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach into the bag of holding and I pull out a little leather pouch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have that sandkheg shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that? What have you got?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I've got this little deck of cards and every time someone pulls from it, great shit happens.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One. Two. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen this before, haven't I? I think I was with you when you got the guy rich. Wasn't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he was on his own.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's the Lord of the Quadroads now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was with him when he did one of them, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're semi-aware that there's something going on. Make an arcana check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, this could go so badly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Something creeping in the back of your mind, something you've learned, something you've heard, really tells you that this is powerful and chaotic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll watch for now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll partake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three. Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I've had enough for one day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're going to do that, we should go back to Whitestone first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get it on. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am drunk enough to where I'm not going to stop it or argue against it, but I won't partake, so that's pretty good for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you so resistant to gifts and wonder? Magic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, you've had two weapons speak to you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't be jelly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Power comes at a price. You think that wonderful things are going to be pulled out of your hands here, and there's going to be no consequences?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, haven't we been through enough shit to know nothing's free?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here or Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, definitely not at Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Pike, you want one? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've always worried about the two of you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I think you should pick a card, and we deal with one as of right now. And then maybe I'll pick one later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter and groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're such an asshole!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're such a dick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You insult our resolve and hold out on us all at the same time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The night's still young.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ugh, just pick one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're traveling now? We're drunk!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's drive a tree. It'll be fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all wander outside of the tavern, find your way over to the nearest tree that's functional. It takes you a little bit, because a lot of trees look thicker at a distance when you're drunk than when you approach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, this one won't work. No, this won't work. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's more of a shrub.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. Next one. That one looks good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, that looks nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a young boy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You go on ahead. We need to help here with the "construction effort."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got to get your construction on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, we're just--" And then Kima goes, "Yes!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) She doesn't handle that booze very well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll see you soon. Travel safe, and thank you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You complete your spell, emerging from the exterior of the Sun Tree. Back in Whitestone, the comfort is here once more. It seems to be just past dusk at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (slurred) See? When you travel-- wait, no. When you travel west to east, you gain time. See?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you called it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Time travel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (slurred) Happy hour is right now in Whitestone. Just saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head home?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Heading home works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now or forever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, we'll get to the forever bit in a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cry myself to sleep?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to go see Kaylie, I guess, if she's around. Are we hanging out together, or are we breaking off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) Go see your daughter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to go see Kaylie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Asking around a bit, it doesn't take much to find Kaylie in your old room in Whitestone, the one where you both left when you first exited the group for a short time. She's in there, bandaged up, and looks like she's taking a dagger and throwing it into the wall, then walking over and pulling it back out, sitting back on the bed and throwing it, and it bounces off. The hilt hits. She's like, "Fuck." Picks it back up and doesn't notice you in the doorway. As she sits back down, she looks over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You with a dagger in your hand's always a little scary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why, does it frighten you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not any--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Boo!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelps) Okay, it frightens me a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She sheathes it on the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've had better days. I'm all right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're alive."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Surprisingly, yes. We won.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I figured, if you're standing here before me. That's good. Congratulations."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks. I'm sorry that I had to go do that. I had to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd be disappointed if you'd've came back with me. More important things."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So what now? Do you want to go back to Ank'Harel and keep criming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch for a brief second her tough exterior break, and you can see her eyes welling up a little bit. She looks at the ground for a minute, then looks back up at you. "I'm glad "you're safe."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so happy I got to see you again. I thought for a second that when we said goodbye, it was the last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't. I know you too well, at this point. You're too much of a turd to die."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. Only good people die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd like to go back to Ank'Harel. I don't know if this whole Meat Man thing's for me "anymore."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. No, I hear you. I don't know if it's for me, either. It was fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was a lot of fun!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It felt like we were killing time a little bit. There's something else that we should do. I don't know what. Maybe your thing won't be my thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's find someone to pass on the mantle to, eh?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think the Meat Man should be there, just not us."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's a great idea. We'll train a replacement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Still take a percentage. I mean, we worked this hard!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Passive income, right? It's the dream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's the meat and potatoes of any good business venture."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should have thought of that. That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's why the daughter's an upgrade. After that, I don't know. I hate to admit it, but--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you finish school?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Well, let's do that, then. You go to school.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not really made for a lyceum. We can go visit. I didn't expect you to recommend "schooling!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love you, and I want to support you in whatever you want to do, at this point. My time has come, and I've done my thing, and my thing is done, and now I want to help you do whatever it is that you want to do. If that means I can be close to you, then great, but if it doesn't, then I'll come visit every once in a while. We made quite a bit of money as the Meat Man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, that we did."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's a good sum to get started.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would it be enough to pay for a right top-end education so I can gloat over all the "other kids that are raised by the various lords and ladies of Emon? Become one of those privileged kids."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can have the best education.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's what I want to do. I want to rub it in their face."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Education for spite. I like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sounds like a Shorthalt endeavor."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Whatever you need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls you into a hug and rests her head on your shoulder and doesn't say anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You won't have to worry about me anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to worry about you every day."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you for coming into my life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for being enough of a shitbag to bring me into it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so happy. I made so many mistakes, but it turns out that some of them weren't mistakes, after all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm still young and unlearned. Time will tell." She pulls you a little tighter in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll snuggle and fall asleep in the room at some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need some fresh air. You go to sleep." Exhaustion hits you, and you end up passing out at the foot of the bed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in my room now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your old room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to tuck Velora into bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travel and everything has tuckered her out. You tuck her in, put the blanket up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tiptoe out of the room, and I find Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be in Cassandra's room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I talk to you for a moment?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I completely understand if you want to stay with Cassandra for the night. Would you mind not being very comfortable, though? I was thinking of camping in the woods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that sounds lovely, and you're always better than comfortable. I had a thought, actually. My god, it is hard surviving, isn't it? Perhaps Keyleth could use a friend right now, and I know that you carry one with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for a bit. I think she could use a companion who's not going to apologize or give too much sympathy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course. I send Trinket to Keyleth's room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Trinket ascends the stairs, he looks back over the shoulder. (questioning noise)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She might cry a lot on you. All right, dear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes it up the stairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be a lot harder to stay warm out in the woods now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll figure something out. I grew up here. I'm used to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to remember how I used to camp with Vax when we were kids.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to see that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we go out and set up a little fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slurps) And licks up the side of your face. Your hair sticks up for a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, buddy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises) He leans in and plops down on the ground, a giant beanbag mound of bear fur.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cover Trinket with snot and tears as I sob into his belly. First night alone, but with Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Best teddy bear ever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aware of the gesture. I cry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually the exhaustion and the alcohol hits you, and you fall asleep, cuddled up in the warm embrace of a very fantastic, recently meteor-struck bear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Drool and eyeliner and dirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Voice of the Tempest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were wearing eyeliner to our fight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember, I charcoal war-painted?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That makes sense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has everybody gone off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike actually would still be around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I make my way sneakily outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's a couple of things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lovely tea rose garden in the back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's letting Grog go first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you wanted to go somewhere, sneak away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you know, I was just gonna, um.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who wants to go first? Pike? Grog? Who's going first?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just for a little bit, for about an hour, I want to go-- not deep into the woods where Percy and Vex are, but somewhere that's pretty for about an hour, and I'll make my way back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this little break in the trees where you can see the moon breaking through some of the passing clouds over Whitestone. The night is so cold, you can see your breath in the dark air through the beams of moonlight that make it through the canopy. As the wolf looks down at you, his intense eyes making a full scan of what you are, there's a recognition to his expression. The wolf looks back up. (howls) And gives a long, baleful howl, seemingly in remembrance and acknowledging that one with a familiar path to his has found his way back to the realm of the Raven Queen, as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You are a beautiful creature. This might be strange, but I give him a hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are clusters of fur that are dirt-encrusted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit in them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably. He's not a full, ruined beast. He lives in the forest. Smells of earth, dust, and nature. Doesn't seem to react to your hug, but allows it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I sit next to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems to share the space with you for the time that you're in the forest. Not a strong connection, but an acknowledgement, mainly focusing on the moon before it passes through the canopy and is no longer visible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I came out here to build a little something, so I'm glad to have you out here for a little bit. Thank you for staying with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one ear to the side perks open to listen to your statement, but the vision doesn't meet yours, still focused in space as it fades. You get the essence that the wolf acknowledges you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) I feel like Grog would be so happy right now to be around a wolf. I give him a scratch behind his ear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He actually seems to enjoy it and gives into it. One of the giant hind legs of the wolf--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's a good boy. I give out a little howl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He howls along with you. (howls)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was for my friend Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wolf gets up, circles you once, and makes his way into the darkness of the forest once more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Goodbye. After a bit, I head back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wander outside, where I'm by myself. Do I see anyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like it matters. Oh! 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about, there are some of the Pale Guard around. Nobody that you would be looking for, necessarily. You seem to be open to do as you please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pull a card.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, where are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Outside of the castle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the middle of fucking Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, Grog.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, as I'm walking back, do I see him at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Out in front of the castle, out in the courtyard area?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's nighttime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, Pike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make it good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a natural 20.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut your mouth!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a bunch of hit dice from our short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're quietly climbing up the walkway to the base of Castle Whitestone--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's out in the open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You do. You look up and see Grog pull a card from the deck.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I stand and watch for a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, here's the deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. It is really happening. I can't fucking believe--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Travis, pull good! Oh, please don't bring pit fiends on our heads.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I might have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Negative two to everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, what did you pull?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Void.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That can't be good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure it's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the worst one you could get!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something's very bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so bad!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god! (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, Pike saw him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get a reaction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did our internet go? (screaming and groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of all moments.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cackles) This is your doing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your soul is drawn from your body and contained in an object in a place of the DM's choice. One or more powerful beings guard the place. While your soul is trapped in this way, your body is incapacitated. A Wish spell can't restore your soul, but the spell reveals the location of the object that holds it. You draw no more cards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, read it again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll tell you. My soul is drawn from my body. My body is incapacitated. It is placed within an object that the DM chooses. A Wish spell will tell you the location of the object, but will not reverse the action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can anything reverse it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finding it and retrieving the object and restoring the soul.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fucking dick. You're a fucking dick!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, the campaign goes on for another-- I can't believe you just fucking did that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, she rolled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She rolled something. Oh, that was her 20 from before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like we may have her back. Hopefully, because this is going to be-- oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is bad!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, Travis. Why would you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Give me the card. Let this be a lesson to everybody out there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said you weren't going to bring the Deck of Many Things into the game, and then you did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No regrets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hashtag no regrets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No "regerts" at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, I can't even.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Ashley texting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's just yelling obscenities.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her internet just died.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (mispronouncing) Worst fucking timing! Internet has gone! Timing! Worst fucking timing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just obscenities. That's all it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog, as you draw the card from the deck, your vision goes tunneled, dark, to a pinpoint: a singular pinpoint of deep, ruby red. And that's all. Your consciousness falls into a catatonic state.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she get a reaction or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She doesn't get shit? She just watches?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She sees it happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With her 20, she saw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. She's aware.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can't yell? She can't cast something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because he pulled the card. It's not a big (grunts). It's a (flip).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we'll add that to our to do list.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to think that in the next campaign, we're going to find you in a glass coffin like Sleeping fucking Beauty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My body's still there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She rolled a 17.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So Grog's body is still there--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's catatonic until the soul's returned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Catatonic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, you've sealed Vecna. At level 19 and 20, this is not going to be an earth-shattering experience.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, it's just an annoyance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for the sake of the epilogue evening: you guys, all planning to return to your various lives to relax--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm there catatonic with an open deck of cards in my hand like this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You dingus!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody's going to find me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To Grog! He was the dumbest of us all. He was the dumb and the dumb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May he rest in bed sores for all eternity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend the next two weeks finding your way through the halls of Pandemonium.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't fucking believe that shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, we spend two weeks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The halls of Pandemonium?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, where his soul is currently encapsulated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: God, you asshole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are the halls of Pandemonium?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should be

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm keeping you occupied. I really did this for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pandemonium is a plane of madness: a great mass of rock riddled with tunnels carved by howling winds. It is cold, noisy, and dark, with no natural light. Wind quickly extinguishes nonmagical open flames such as torches and campfires. It also makes conversation possible only by yelling, and even then only at a maximum distance of ten feet. Most of the plane's inhabitants are creatures that were banished to the plane with no hope of escape, and many of them have been driven mad by the incessant winds or forced to take shelter in places where the winds die down until they sound like distant cries of torment. So yeah, that's a fun time. It's a fun adventure you guys go on to retrieve Grog's soul.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great therapy lesson.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A healing trip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a good side quest for the future someday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're actually sitting in a reclined, cushioned couch or chair of some kind in Castle Whitestone, and all of your currently living friends are all around you, looking

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! It got me a chair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You fucking idiot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cannot believe you did that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth backhands him with the hand that has the most rings on it, of power.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I lose any hit points?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Probably not!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? What happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You lost card privileges.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep. Hand them over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we already took the whole deck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You may lose your belt for this, friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. You're lucky we didn't shave your beard. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I fucked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You fucked up a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy lost his arm rescuing you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I just thought, it did fantastic things before! I don't know why it doesn't like me so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it was personal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've learned a lesson that we had to pay for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Sorry, guys. Sorry, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at that timing. I don't even know, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, can you hear us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My internet crashed at the

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't even see you right now. You're a silhouette on the screen, but we can hear you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, do you know what happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I texted her the gist of what happened.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so you disappeared?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog's soul was trapped somewhere on the plane of Pandemonium, and you guys had to take two weeks and battle your way through a terrible plane filled with wind and madness and creatures that were banished there to never escape, eventually battling some terrible beast that was guarding the gem that contained his soul, returned, and he just now woke up on the couch after restoring his consciousness to his body, and has been slapped in the face by Keyleth and told that he lost card privileges.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (tearfully) And Percy lost his arm!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no. Wait, what?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I may have been fibbing about that part.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It might be a cheap joke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might have lost my arm or I might be hiding it behind my back. I'm not sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So news flash, pro tip: the cards may be dangerous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's good to know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Maybe we leave it alone, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! Hi! Oh my god, that was craziness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice. Any other things that we need to wrap up for the evening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull a card from the deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! I invoke the third contract.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll draw the card for you. Whichever one smashes Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suddenly, I lose everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. Oh my god, if you pull that card?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wouldn't that be amazing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't you even.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Penniless?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything he owns crumbles to dust.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All material wealth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's why I don't pull cards!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How fucked would that be? So fucked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bring it in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After this unexpected side venture, you all say your goodbyes for the time being, scatter to the various business you have to. Pike? Is there anything else you wanted to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we leaving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was there anything else this evening you needed to situate? I was going to begin to facilitate the epilogue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I grab Keyleth and Vex real quick?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Girl power.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take them to the little spot where I was in the woods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's dumb, but I made a bench and I put Vax's name on it and I didn't want to make him a headstone because that seems so final. Maybe he's still around somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I also have these. I take out two of his feathers that I grabbed. And I thought you could put this with the feathers in your hair, Vex and Keyleth, you could do something with this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I have the perfect place for this. Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sure you could make it look a little prettier than it is but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's perfect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's absolutely perfect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are we going to put it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want it out in the woods?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe we should just leave it here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he'd like that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think he would too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something you have to stumble upon. It's a little hidden.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's stealthy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealthy memorial!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll let you guys stay. I just wanted to do one more thing. Okay, I walk over to where Scanlan is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean two weeks ago or are we after--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is after the random, unexpected Pandemonium trip.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, is Grog on the trip or was that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no. You guys had to go there to find his soul.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog was the reason for this season!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To be fair, nothing really happened in that mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now that Percy's arm has healed, I'm fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Now that was bad, wasn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. That bugbear came out of nowhere.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The bugbear, you said?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry about it. I'm fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Listen, I'm glad you're alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me too. Thanks for saving us all in that big fight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I care for you, Pike. I've always loved you since the moment I met you and I'm so happy that we became friends as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for everything. Thank you for putting up with me when I was a shit and I hope that I've become more tolerable for you. After all that we've been through, I was wondering if I could ask you a question. I have a proposal for you, if you don't mind. Well, now that everything is safe again and back to normal, I was wondering if I could take you on a date. To a restaurant or something, then maybe if it goes well, we could go on another date and that's it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I actually was going to ask you the same thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then. I'll let you do it! No, you do it! I don't want to-- I take it back! I don't ask you on a date!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Denied.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was amazing!

lines.name: LAURA, MATT, SAM
lines.text: That was a yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's 2017. When will we will have better Skype?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the most Scanlan thing I could have ever hoped for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, we're America. We have the worst Internet in the world. Weirdly. Net neutrality. As you guys gather, say your temporary goodbyes, knowing that you're all still very in touch with each other, knowing you care about each other, you begin to forge whatever life looks like outside of perpetual danger and the constant onslaught and struggle of terrors and heroic necessity. Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Sorry, I'm having a text romance with Ashley Johnson right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then I'll come back to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I'm ready. I can pull myself away from Pike for a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does Scanlan do in the next year? Next five years, next ten years?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clears throat) I have one prepared. Well, she's not here, so I don't know but I wrote down--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you hear me at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, I love this!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, my Internet keeps going out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perfect timing, Ash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all right. So assuming that you guys went on a date. I'm discussing with Scanlan his epilogue. What does he wish to do in the next year, five and ten years?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My plan, what I wrote down, was find Kaylie, make sure she's okay. Help Pike repair Vasselheim or literally whatever she wants to do. Give all money to Kaylie except for my platinum bracelets with sapphires worth 2,500 gold that I send anonymously to Sybil to make sure she's taken care of. Long term, I would like to use my Wish/Teleport to check on Kaylie every now and then, at school or wherever she ends up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have connections to the council and with the money that you've given her, she lords over many of the children of the various nobles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have recommended my tutor, but of course, Vax slit his throat right about the time you met him. He was a good tutor before that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know but we'll wait until we get to Ashley to find out how things are going with our dating. Otherwise, in my free time, I would love to use my time to write down the epic stories of Vox Machina, from our meeting to saving the world and everything in between. It will be difficult as Scanlan is not an author, but he will rely on guidance from Ioun herself and may even ask Sprigg to be a copy-editor of sorts. The working title is "In the Belly of Dragons: The Legend of Scanlan "Shorthalt and Vox Machina". Working title.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "In the Anus of Dragons," accurately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I hope to finish the book by the time I turn 71.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How old are you, exactly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'd be 70. When we started, I was 69.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You motherfucker!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're full of shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, I can't believe you were that young.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This whole time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you were 300 years old. Jesus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just full of shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, that's about it. I think every once in a while, I would maybe try to see if I could see Vax or check in on him somehow, but I don't know how other than to scry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty 3.0 now stands a shining golden color, gifted the materials by a thankful ore baron whom Taryon's Brigade of Adventurers saved from a terrifying doppelgänger's plot. His troupe continues to gain a small bit of notoriety in the southern lands of the Dwendalian Empire, some good, some humorous. His mother, Mariya, ever cheering them on and making their tabards for years before passing away peacefully, proud of her boy. Her passing brings the rest of the family closer together than it's ever been. And the charitable efforts, surprisingly, of Howaardt now encompass the Darrington Brigade as a non-profit adventuring league. During a gambling run in Port Demali to follow, Taryon stumbles upon a now slightly more haggard Lawrence, now working as a tanner. They immediately fell right back where they left off and Lawrence cashed in his life as a leather worker to join the Brigade alongside Taryon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That's so great!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything you wish to add to that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I had written a letter, but yours is much better. Yeah, that's great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You wrote a letter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't know how much Matt was going to put.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could still read the letter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can read the end of the letter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's fine. You did good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I didn't mean to step on anything you did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you did great. Much better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What else would you like to do? What else do you wish to achieve, Pike, as the years go on? That could pertain to you and whatever relationship with Scanlan you wish to embellish on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we roll for dating? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a chart somewhere in second edition.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what Grog's plans are, but I do know if there were any adventuring to be had, that her and Grog got to on some adventures together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And that he always has a place in my home and I know I would love to-- I'm sure at this point, fully rebuild the temple in Vasselheim. I think things have gone well with Scanlan. Oh man, I'm getting so emotional.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like second-base well or even better than that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I think if we spend enough time together, maybe, I don't know, can we see what else life has for us together?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That doesn't have to mean anything more. I know your life, what you like to do and I'll give you freedom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think the most free I've ever been is with you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think you get a two-for-one deal!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. The weird family dynamic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys keep it quiet up there, please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weird roommates. Giant lower floor, tiny upper floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The ceiling is one inch above your head.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think at some point, I ask Scanlan for his hand in marriage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I would have to ask Wilhand for his permission.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He passed away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, I would go leave some flowers at the grave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can ask me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I will ask Grog for permission. Grog, as the father figure in our weird household, I would like to ask for your permission to wed your not-daughter, Pike, who is much smarter and older than you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're a scoundrel. Do you have any money?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have this little black rock that you gave me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's worth literally nothing. How about you give her this? And I take out the rare black sapphire and put it in your hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm fucking watching you, you understand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I won't hurt her, I promise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you slip up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope, I know you could kill me in my sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. I usually put dead people in the bag of holding, but there's always a first! Treat her right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you walk me down the aisle and by walk me down the aisle, I mean carry me down the aisle? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's have a group weird hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw. All righty. Anything else, Pike? Are you happy with that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to convert, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to convert? I'm an Iounian.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're Iounish?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sarenrae's very accepting of other gods.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Multi-faith ceremony. There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 16 rites of passage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival. Vex'ahlia. Since your fates are rather intertwined, I ask you both what are your plans, what are your plots?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't really think we should settle down. That seems like a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that I would like to start a very complicated art project that's going to take many years. I'm not going to work on it all the time, day and night, but I'm going to invest some time in this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to be in your shop a lot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like the one in Prague. I'm going to take many years and it's going to sit at the front of the castle so it will be outside and there will be other people working on it. It will, as a proper clock does, it will tell our story. Once a year, everything will play out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit. That's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we may start inviting tinkering artisans every year for Whitestone to come show off things that are not necessarily useful, but to show off fanciful inventions and things that are beautiful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love that idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, although we will have to stay here for nine months every once in a while, because I think we should rebuild the families that we've lost.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lot of names.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: So many names.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many names?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So many ways to irritate your father.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five names.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, at the very least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot of names. Very long names.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I definitely want to build a statue to Trinket, the wonder bear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The wonder bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he dead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Trinket's around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So centuries of people in Whitestone will remember their mascot, Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ranger's hat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As the years pass, we should start a festival and bears will be everywhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There will be. Bears will be involved in the festival. Obviously. Especially since the clock tower is part of the festival and bears feature heavily in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only you can prevent forest fires.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was hoping to never stop attempting to contact Vax through the temple of the Raven Queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice that the raven population of Whitestone seems to be perpetually seeing blooms every year, far more than it used to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Speak with Animals on them and I constantly try to communicate with him.

lines.name: MATT
