lines.text: Okay, I mean they all seem to be ravens happy to live in this space, but it seems to be more in essence the vicinity more than a specific raven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you be all right if we increased the Pelor temple here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I trust your judgment. It is not for me, but I'm definitely all right with anything that makes you happy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, darling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, you'd do it anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty much, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I help Cassandra as best I can. I think at least once a year we get out and do something irresponsible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe sometimes drag these kids out for shenanigans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within the year following the battle with Vecna, she begins to remind you of yourself at a very dark time. Recognizing that, you come to her and help pull her from a dangerous edge of lashing out at the place she's worked so hard to build. You help her realize that this guilt she's been holding as being a tool of manipulation the times that she has been is not her fault and used against the ones she loves. In that determination to no longer be a tool for others to use, she asks Vex to teach her and train her. To not just be the lady beacon of Whitestone, but also join in as one of its protectors.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least she had some good promise a long time ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was some time, but I've seen what you can do and, well, I deign to think of how dangerous "the three of us would be if I could reach your level."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll make you strong, darling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also insist that she leave Whitestone at least once a year for a period of time to do fuck all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's a beautiful place called Dalen's Closet. I think you would love it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not, well yes, there's, well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else? You guys happy with that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm content to make a clock tower and make art and never make another weapon. I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm, all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have "Make Whitestone the tits," written in my notes of things that I want to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got a bear. I'm imagining the bear from Burning Man actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Penny Bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Penny Bear. I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so fascinated by Vasselheim. I have so many interests that I feel it only proper to go back and turn myself in to the authorities for punching one of the guards in the face and take whatever punishment they have for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you head back to the district in which these incursions happened, you are immediately recognized and much to their completely taken aback reaction they bring you in until somebody of the higher Bastions goes, "You fools. This is one of Vox Machina. What's wrong "with you?" "Oh I didn't--" And they all point up at the large titan which is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, up top, that's where we were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which currently has been cleared out of any cursed undead that they know of. It's a process that takes a while, but it becomes a monument to that battle and it becomes converted into a symbol of hope for the city. For generations to come in Vasselheim, that titan will stand there, lording over the city, as a reminder of what transpired, of what could have been lost, and what was saved that day in memory of those that were lost. And as you point up to that and they all realize, they slowly remove your shackles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm free to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, sir. Thank you, thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's unexpected. Could you point me in the direction of a library?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure, come with me." As you begin to walk out you watch as a familiar figure steps up to this portion of the Bastions' guard post, you see a familiar merchant who rushes up and goes, "I was "being summoned. They found the-- why's he walking free?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. You. You will come with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the man who ruined my business. I can--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gentlemen, whose word are you going to take? The savior of Vasselheim, or his new tutor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards go, "Cobalt Reserve library station is down that way to the left. Hard to miss, "big blue dome. You two work this out." And they retract back into the guard post, leaving the two of you in the street.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, unless you have something better to do, you could contribute to one of the greatest people to ever pass through this city and help me learn to read a little bit more. Would that be a problem? I only have 8,000 gold to give you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 8,000 gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 8,000 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I'm curious to see what this change of heart is, so sure. But you're going to pay upfront."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, 8,000 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Holy shit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could carry it if you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll just make a quick stop over by my shop, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he drags it and it leaves this big heavy groove in the ground as he pulls it along. "Nope, "nope, it's good, I got it" (struggling noises) And leads you to the Cobalt Reserve and for as long as you'll have him he'll begin to tutor you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to learn to read a bit more. I'd like to split some time in the temple of Kord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which takes a while to get rebuilt and you probably help out a bit, too, Earthbreaker Groon, who survived, though many of his--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he did survive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did survive, yeah. He's made of hardier stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd also like to bring Pike out every once in a while and we give challengers a shot in the Crucible, but mostly I'm trying to improve my mind and looking for the next challenge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bring him up to eight intelligence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Happy with that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then. Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Reconnect with him, have coffee, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He's a quick jaunt from Zephra, thankfully. Westruun's not that far. That's one of the closer large cities outside of Stillben.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perfect. We're weekend buddies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We go to wine country. And then I work on the propagated sprig from the Sun Tree and continue to build it out, hopefully on the ley lines of the planet, and I take the feather that Pike gave me from Vax and I embed it into the trunk of the tree as well as any other relics from the Raven Queen I can find. Care for ravens as much as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is an uptick of ravens in the space of Zephra as well. Not many, but more than there would be, which is usually zero.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And from the branch of the Sun Tree create my own raven tree of the Ashari. Take a long, long, long, long, long time before I maybe date again. Maybe. But eventually, hopefully, after a long, long, long, long, long time sunset into the tree and become a part of this realm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a ways off for you, Ms. Archdruid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ways off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you begin those preparations.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that's the plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he notices you approach, he looks over. "In all my years, not a day passes where awe does not "strike me at the beauty of this world." He looks over towards the sunset. "Don't ever lose the "memory of every face whose strength helped you keep this light from fading. Every single face."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're lucky to experience it, a few are lucky to think it's beautiful. You taught me that. I don't have to appreciate this. Especially not after what I've seen. But I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You need to."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only because of what I've seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see a bit of heartbreak but he nods his head and reaches out and takes you in, holds you there on the cliff side, the winds just being kept at bay. "I'm proud of you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. It's all I ever wanted. It's weird, once you reach a life goal and then realize you have the rest of your life. I guess I just find new goals. Sometimes it's hard being a prodigy because then you just grow up to be a regular adult.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls you in tighter. "You'll always be my girl. My little Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Dad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I love you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just one raven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blow a kiss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flies down, lands on your shoulder. It's a bigger raven than any you've seen before. You've not seen this raven around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little scratch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we're going to close the campaign.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What a nice story.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, wow. When this chapter closes, a whole new one, a whole new one opens very soon. (sighs) We'll be back in the new year with a new story to tell and in the meantime we'll be playing games here and mixing it up. Being silly. A few other faces are going to take up the storytelling mantle here. Me and Marisha have a wedding in a little over a week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But here we are at the end of this near-five-year journey for us and near-three-year journey with all of you and I just want to appreciate having, honestly, some of the best friends and players I could ever hope for to come along on this journey, to trust me enough to build this with you and to give back so much more than I could have ever hoped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, Matt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Best DM ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make it all easy and worthwhile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And love you guys, each and every one of you out there who've come with us on this journey; new, old, for just a bit, or the entire length, some of you multiple times. Thank you for joining in on whatever this weird little magical, curious experience has, and will continue to be. Promise me you'll be good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll be back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll be back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We might look a little different, but we're still going to be here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was beautiful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks, Matt. That was really nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love you, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Love you, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love you, guys. Have a wonderful night. Rest well. And is it Thursday yet?
